synopsis: A glimpse of Tanaka-kun's day at school.
Tanaka and Ohta are stuck in a packed cafeteria counter wanting to buy bread.
In the middle of his lunch, Tanaka thinks about the difference in doing bothersome routines.
Tanaka had a very interesting dream but forgot about it when he's telling it to Ohta.
Tanaka missed his stop while snoozing on a train. While typing a message to Ohta telling he's gonna be late, he snoozed again, sending an incomprehensible text message.
Tanaka attempts to open a tea carton using a straw, but when he failed on doing so, he gave up. Ohta suggests using a scissor.
Instead of taking the usual route, Tanaka has to detour due to a construction site going on.
The guys are talking what their characters would be in a game. Ohta fits well being a beefy warrior while Tanaka...
While waiting for the instant noodles to cook, Tanaka waits patiently. However, his three minutes is equivalent to a long time normally!
Tanaka thinks of eating a popsicle bothersome due to the obligation of catching its dripping.
The guys chose to drink corn soup from the vending machine. While the others gulped it down quickly, Tanaka slowly drank his.

Ohta wants to visit a confectionery and asked if Tanaka wanted to come along. Tanaka searches in his mind how long it will take them to go to Ishiyamabashi station. With no transfers needed, he lazily accepted.
Since they are switching between classrooms more often, Katou suggested in having different carrying methods for Tanaka.

Tanaka uses his smartphone alarm's vibration feature to massage his shoulder. On the other hand, this doesn't answer Ohta's calls.

The last 12 seconds of the episode is a commercial for an event and the anime's BD and DVD.

Tanaka and Ohta talk about how people count sheep when they want to sleep. However, in the middle of their conversation, Tanaka fell asleep! After a few hours, he woke up and continued the conversation.
Tanaka wonders if there's anything good on TV, so he reaches for its remote. As a result of laziness, he tried using telekinesis to move the remote closer to him, but failed.
Tanaka has an extendable hand tool that allows him to pick up or grab small items even from afar. Oota thinks it's very fitting for him. When he brought it to school, he did not even use it.
Tanaka wants to eat the pudding he found in the fridge. He tries to find a spoon to use but ends up finding a giant one. He tried eating it but the spoon just won't fit.

Since Tanaka feels bad making Oota carry him, he brought a trolley with him as an alternative. When he got on the trolley and the class bell rang, Oota hurriedly pushed the trolley and drifted on the corner, which made Tanaka fall from it.
Miyano complains to Tanaka why he doesn't reply back to her messages. Tanaka told her that it's tiring to do so. When Oota checked the messages she sent him, it's because it's really lengthy.

Tanaka felt itchy since morning and it's because he wore his shirt the other way. He feels that it takes effort to take the tag off, yet he still tries to remove it. Miyano saw him doing that and was amazed by his "mature itchy-neck pose."

There is a typhoon going on. Tanaka realized that if he goes to school during a typhoon, the wind will just blow him to the building, and would surely surprise Oota. However, when he steps out, he couldn't bear how strong the wind is.

Tanaka thought that just simply holding the dustpan is the easiest job. Little did he know that he has to move backward to collect all dirt properly. Oota, on the other hand, just carried him to lessen Tanaka's load.

Saya asks his brother Oota an effective training to build muscles since even training on her club, she's not building any. Thus, Saya tries to carry Rino with her arm as an "effective training" according to her brother.
Shiraishi has noticed that Tanaka doesn't wear his necktie though Tanaka says that he has it in his bag. When he grabbed it, it was Rino's ribbon.
Tanaka found a tea stalk in his drink. Oota says that it brings good luck so Tanaka brought it home and gave it to Rino.
Miyano heard that bunnies were recently born at the zoo and visitors can pet them! As Echizen heard it, she excitingly walks leaving Miyano behind.
Tanaka has run out of toilet paper! Lazy to get some, he decided to just wait for someone to come.
Tanaka and his friends are playing softball and he's currently the one batting! With two strikes and three balls, what choice would he make to not get tired?
Tanaka had a terrible dream! He dreamt of having a huge serving of boiled crabs. Even though he likes them, he finds it annoying to eat them.

Tanaka wants to change the channel but can't reach the remote control. Thus, he tries to manipulate the TV using his "psychic powers." As Rino scolded him, he uses his powers to her! She ended up passing the remote to his brother.
Shiraishi tries to shorten her skirt length to reach the ideal "length of cuteness." However, it feels really short for her.
Oota gave Tanaka a gum to ease his boredom.
Tanaka is too sleepy to go to his room so he had an idea of proclaiming the living room into his own room!
They say that abdominal breathing is good for your health, so Tanaka and Katou tried doing it. However, is Tanaka doing it right?
